snippet.title: Snowkissed Romance - Coming 12.15.19!
snippet.description:
Get excited! Lovely, Inc. is about to released their FIRST full-form otome app. Many of you may know I released Snowkissed Romance as a beta a couple years ago. It's now been fully revamped with added features like voicemails, texts, and calls, all new art, and ALL main routes available for purchase. For a limited time you will be able to enjoy the FIRST FOUR CHAPTERS for free!! We will also be bundling all three routes with a discount for a limited time. More info to come!

Twitter: @lovelyinc_
